text: Have there been updates on the drag and drop email beta that was discussed and supposedly on the roadmap as of a few years ago? <@U018SKF3M9U> <@U01QW45AR0Q> we're responding from HubSpot about that

<@U027Z0MK4RY> I have good news, the coded DND areas are being worked on at the moment!

We are also looking to recruit a small number of people that will get early access to test this and will have the opportunity to provide direct feedback. Let me know in DM if you are interested in taking part!
